name: Booking
description: Scheduled time for using a lab instrument or space.

name: Meeting
description: Lab or project meeting.

name: Training
description: Training session for equipment or procedures.

name: Maintenance
description: Scheduled maintenance for lab equipment.

name: Experiment
description: Dedicated time for conducting a specific experiment.

name: Presentation
description: Presentation or seminar within the lab.

name: Cleanup
description: Scheduled lab cleanup time.

name: Calibration
description: Instrument calibration.

name: Field Work
description: Time allocated for research conducted outside the lab.

name: Data Analysis
description: Dedicated time for analyzing experimental data.

name: Writing
description: Time allocated for writing papers, reports, or thesis.

name: Consultation
description: Meeting with a supervisor or collaborator.

name: Safety Drill
description: Scheduled safety drill or exercise.

name: Visitor Tour
description: Tour for visitors or prospective students.

name: Purchasing
description: Time allocated for ordering supplies or equipment.

name: Sample Preparation
description: Dedicated time for preparing samples.

name: Software Session
description: Session for using specific lab software.

name: Review
description: Reviewing data, proposals, or papers.

name: Workshop
description: Internal lab workshop on a specific topic.

name: Discussion
description: Informal discussion session.
